content:
Defender Alessandro Bastoni said ‘it’s a dream come true’ to play for Inter and has reassured fans that he is not looking to move. ‘Inter are my home’.
So far, the young defender has played 14 times in Serie A under Antonio Conte and is tied to the club unti… [+963 chars]
